group_1.narration: And so, we boarded the train and@returned home to Mitakihara.
I was so caught up in my thoughts, we@arrived in Mitakihara before I knew it...

group_1.textLeft: Huh? My legs feel kind of heavy...

group_1.textRight: I can't take anymore myself, either!@I'm totally exhausted.
Yep, that was the first time I've ever had to@fight like that.
Uwasa, Witches, Magical Girls... There was@no end to them!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I wasn't expecting it either.
But now that we're back here in Mitakihara...
All the fighting we did doesn't feel real...

group_1.textRight: You're right. Everything's so calm now.
Things that happened only a few hours ago@feel like distant memories.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... We couldn't bring her back.

group_1.textRight: But, I just know she's still alive.
So, let's go back to Kamihama. Next time,@we'll definitely save her.

group_1.narration: We couldn't find Mami...@But we didn't leave empty-handed.
All the Witches, Uwasa...@The Wings of the Magius, Doppels...
I've lived the same timeline repeatedly,@but this time everything is new to me...
What in the world is going on?
There must be some big secret@behind these phenomena.
This power they called a Doppel...@And the Wings of the Magius...

group_1.textCenter: (I'm not certain yet, but... If I can get to@the bottom of that big secret...)
(Then the fate of the Magical Girls...@Madoka's future...)
(I may be able to change all of it. No...[wait:1.0][chara:200301:motion_200]@I will change it.)
